name: freelancing-website-practice-project
description: Created 02/27/2018 A freelancing website based off of the concepts of sites such as upwork. This is a practice project, it is not intended to become an in production website. The technologies used are Node.js with Express.js for the backend, Postgres for the database, and ReactJS for the starting front end. The starting focus of this project is on code quality, enforcing code standards with ESLint, connecting Node.js with React.js, unit testing, stronger github practices, and continous integration via Circleci.
author: Jerrod

scripts.setup: npm install && bnr db-reset && npm --prefix ./client install
scripts.db:reset:test: bnr create-test-db && bnr knex migrate:latest --env test

betterScripts.db-reset: bnr create-db && bnr knex migrate:latest && bnr create-admin-and-fields && bnr knex seed:run && bnr knex migrate:latest --env test

ScriptsComments.Info: These are just comments for the above scripts for understanding. Written in same order as the scripts and uses the same name
ScriptsComments.test: Runs the tests for the server, timeouts at 20 seconds, and ignores global variable leaks.
ScriptsComments.init: Script to setup the backend. Installs node modules, creates main and test dbs, runs migrations, and seeds
ScriptsComments.setup: Same as init, but also installs the node modules for the client directory, the front end facing react app.
ScriptsComments.lint: Runs eslint to check for any lint errors
ScriptsComments.db:reset: Runs the bnr script to create/reset the main database, run migrations, create admin and fields table and inital records, run seeds, and create/reset the test database
ScriptsComments.db:reset:test: This script creates/resets the test database and runs migrations for the that database, used mainly for testing and by circleci
ScriptsComments.db:create:migration: Uses knex to create a new migrations file, should be written in 'npm run db:create:migration file_name' format.
ScriptsComments.db:migrate: Runs the latest migrations for the main database
ScriptsComments.db:migrate:rollback: Rollsback the latest migrations for the main database
ScriptsComments.db:migrate:test: Runs the latest migrations for the test database
ScriptsComments.db:migrate:test:rollback: Rollsback the latest migrations for the test database
ScriptsComments.db:create-seed: Uses knex to create a new seed file. Should be written in 'npm run db:create-seed file_name' format.
ScriptsComments.db:seeds:run: Runs seeds for the main database

BetterScriptsComments.Info: These are just comments for the above betterScripts section for understanding. Written in same order as the scripts and uses the same name
BetterScriptsComments.knex: This script is just a shortcut to access knex, basically a variable for the file path, keeps scripts shorter.
BetterScriptsComments.db-reset: Creates/resets the main database, run migrations for it, create the admin and fields table and inital records, run seeds, and creates/resets the test database
BetterScriptsComments.create-admin-and-fields: Runs a file to create the inital admin record and the inital field records for their respective tables.
